paper.title: Planning in polynomial time: the SAS-PUBS class

author.org: Department of Computer Science, Linköping University, S‐581 83 Linköping, Sweden
Department of Electrical Engineering, Linköping University, S‐581 83 Linköping, Sweden

paper.abstract: This article describes a polynomial-time, O(n3), planning algorithm for a limited class of planning problems. Compared to previous work on complexity of algorithms for knowledge-based or logic-based planning, our algorithm achieves computational tractability, but at the expense of only applying to a significantly more limited class of problems. Our algorithm is proven correct, and it always returns a parallel minimal plan if there is a plan at all.
